thread.title: S&P Cuts Brazil’s Debt Rating to Junk
thread.title_full: S&P Cuts Brazil’s Debt Rating to Junk - WSJ

author: Paul Kiernan
title: S&P Cuts Brazil’s Debt Rating to Junk
text:
RIO DE JANEIRO—Brazil lost its coveted investment-grade credit rating in the eyes of one major firm on Wednesday, as Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services downgraded the country’s sovereign debt into speculative, or junk, territory for the first time since 2008.
Citing political challenges to the government’s efforts to balance its budget, S&P cut Brazil’s sovereign debt by one notch to BB+, the highest rung on the speculative...
